The conference will take place at Duke University.

We reserved West Duke Building located at East Campus (see the map on the right), with rooms 101 and 107F are reserved for sessions.

The bus line [400 Durham-Chapel Hill](https://gotriangle.org/maps-schedules/gotriangle/400) can be used for public transport.

We will update this page for more information soon!
